remarks:
An alternate for the Linearity Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz ~ loolin , due to Barbara Wozniakowska, _Reports on Mathematical Logic_ 10, 129-137 (1978).  (Contributed by Mel L. O'Cat, 8-Aug-2004.)

 An alternate for the Linearity Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz, due to Barbara Wozniakowska, _Reports on Mathematical Logic_ 10, 129-137 (1978).  (Contributed by O'Cat, 8-Aug-2004.)
statement: loowoz $p |- ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ph -> ch ) ) -> ( ( ps -> ph ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
